entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 5:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 57 %
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: 22 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening then changing to rain overnight. Risk of freezing rain after midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 late this evening then southwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 5 except high 9 inland.
entry.summary: Rain or drizzle ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 5 except high 9 inland. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
